means: 不屈服的，不气馁的，不可战胜的
不屈服地，不气馁地，不可战胜地

sentence.Network_en: Above all Susie is a great survivor, with a bright, indomitable spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 总之，苏茜不畏艰难，开朗乐观、不屈不挠。

sentence.Network_en: They overcame all kinds of difficulties by dint of an indomitable spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们凭仗着顽强不屈的精神克服了重重困难.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 百字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 百战不殆〖 never-losing〗 百折不挠〖 indomitable〗 百褶裙〖 bouffancy;pleatedskirt〗.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... dominate 主宰 indomitable 不屈不挠的 facilitate 使...容易.
ATTITUDE IS EVERYTHING_在线英语听力室 ... ) allergic a. 过敏 ) indomitable a. 不屈不挠 ) hold up 举起.
顽强(indomitable):一种坚韧不拔的毅力,坚定的信念,顽强不屈的精神,无论做什么事,不到最后一刻决不放弃,一定要进行到底。做人,做生活的强者,既表现在遇到困难.

list.abs: in 1983 , Haidi embarked on the path of literature , her indomitable perseverance to overcome the disease and the difficulties to carry out creative excellence , inflexible fighting on the literature .年，海迪走上了文学创作的道路，她以顽强的毅力克服疾病和困难，精益求精地进行创作，执着地为文学而战。

DNF美服大全，献给所有正... ... throw mastery 投掷精通（毒王最爱啊） indomitable spirit 不屈意志 magic critical hit 魔法暴击.
单词的... ... 2:be indomitable 百折不挠;百折不饶; 3:Indomitable spirit 不屈不挠的精神; 4:Indomitable Ancients 大无畏先人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'untameable'): from late Latin indomitabilis, from in- 'not' + Latin domitare 'to tame'

entry.tran: 不屈不挠的;不气馁的;不服输的
entry.def: If you say that someone has an indomitable spirit, you admire them because they never give up or admit that they have been defeated.

example.ex: ...the indomitable spirit of the Polish people.
example.tran: 波兰人民不屈不挠的精神

stems_affixes.word_buile: dom屋,家+estic表形容词→家里的→驯养的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有统治权的,占优势的,支配的
stems_affixes.word_buile: domin=dom统治+ant→adj.有统治权的,占优势的,支配的
in不+dom统治+itable→不可统治的→不可征服的→坚强不屈的
pre在……前面+dominant支配的→adj.[over]占优势的;主要的,突出的
dom统治+ain表名词→统治的区域
domestic驯养的+ate表动词→v.驯养[动物]
dom统治+inate→v.支配,统治,控制;占优势

means.word_mean: 不屈服的,不气馁的,不可战胜的

sentences.en: A selfless man has an indomitable spirit.
